title: New York Evening Journal
additional-note: Some images from the New York Evening Journal were renewed separately in the Artwork section, rather than in the Contributions to Periodicals section.  The first such image with an active copyright is by George Herriman, and is titled 'Us husbands. What do you mean, I never go out.'.  It ran in the January 16, 1926 issue, and was renewed in 1953.
